# Javscripts  

__navigation.min.js__

Basic support for browser that recognize/support ``classList``

Desktop Browsers:
* Chrome 10+
* Firefox 3.6+  
* Internet Explorer 10+  
* Opera 11.50  
* Safari 5.1+  

Mobile Browsers:
* Android 3.0+
* Firefox Mobile 1.0+  
* Windows Phone with IE 10+
* Opera Mobile 11.10+  
* Safari 5.0+

__navigation navigation.android-ie8.min.js__ has a polyfill for:  
  
* Internet Explorer 8+  
* Android 2.3.1+
